review: It didn't work for my intended use.  I wanted to use this device in my master bedroom with a wall mounted TV, but after an hour of trouble shooting determined that the antenna didn't have the strength to access my wi-fi over that distance.  I moved my old Roku 2 to my bedroom, which didn't have any signal strength problems, and this one to the family room, where it works fine, but not how I wanted to set it up.
